CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( Planning_Status__c , "Scoped"),OR(ISPICKVAL( Design_Status__c , ""),ISPICKVAL(Design_Status__c, "Not Started")),OR(ISPICKVAL(Build_Status__c,""),ISPICKVAL(Build_Status__c, "Not Started")),OR(ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, ""),ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, "Not Started"))),"To Do",
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Planning_Status__c, "Scoped"),OR(ISPICKVAL(Design_Status__c, ""),ISPICKVAL( Design_Status__c ,"In Progress"),ISPICKVAL(Design_Status__c, "Approved")),OR(ISPICKVAL(Build_Status__c, ""),ISPICKVAL(Build_Status__c, "Not Started"),ISPICKVAL( Build_Status__c ,"In Progress")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, ""),ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, "Not Started"),ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, "In Progress"))),"In Progress",
IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, ""),ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, "Not Started"),ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, "In Progress")),ISPICKVAL(Planning_Status__c, "Scoped"), ISPICKVAL( Design_Status__c , "Approved"),ISPICKVAL( Build_Status__c , "Completed"),OR(ISPICKVAL(Demo_Status__c, "Demo Complete"), ISPICKVAL(Demo_Status__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Demo_Status__c, "Ready for Demo"),ISPICKVAL(Demo_Status__c,"Demo Not Needed"))),"In Testing",
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Test_Status__c, "Approved"),OR(ISPICKVAL(Demo_Status__c, ""),ISPICKVAL(Demo_Status__c, "Ready for Demo"))),"In Testing",
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Planning_Status__c, "Scoped"),ISPICKVAL(Design_Status__c, "Approved"),ISPICKVAL(Build_Status__c, "Completed"),ISPICKVAL( Test_Status__c , "Approved"),OR(ISPICKVAL( Demo_Status__c , "Demo Complete"), ISPICKVAL( Demo_Status__c ,"Demo Not Needed"))),"Done","Backlog")))))
CustomField.label: Kanban Status
